articles.author: Rebecca Samervel
articles.title: Prosecution files plea for cancellation of Rana couple's bail
articles.description: Special public prosecutor Pradip Gharat on Monday filed a plea seeking cancellation of bail granted to Independent Amravati MP Navneet Rana and her MLA husband Ravi Rana citing violation of conditions. He also sought a non-bailable warrant against them.
